main

Interface Protocol


  • public interface Protocol
    Interface with constants as defined for group 4.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Protocol.Error 

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String ASK_PLAYERS_ALL
      Requests list of players on this server.
      static java.lang.String ASK_PLAYERS_EXT
      Requests list of players with certain extensions.
      static java.lang.String CLIENT_MOVE
      Used to send move by a client.
      static java.lang.String CONFIRM
      Used to confirm connection.
      static java.lang.String CONNECT
      Connect this client.
      static java.lang.String DISCONNECT
      Disconnect this client.
      static java.lang.String END_DRAW
      Broadcasted when game has ended in draw.
      static java.lang.String END_WINNER
      Broadcasted when game has ended in winner.
      static java.lang.String READY
      Readies this client.
      static java.lang.String RES_PLAYERS_ALL
      Result of player list query.
      static java.lang.String RES_PLAYERS_EXT
      Result of player list query with extension criteria.
      static java.lang.String SERVER_MOVE
      Broadcasted message announcing current move and future move (if applicable).
      static java.lang.String START
      Inform client game will start.
      static java.lang.String UNREADY
      Unreadies this client.

    • Field Detail

      • CONNECT

        static final java.lang.String CONNECT
        Connect this client. Example: CONNECT stevejobs 01 Or: CONNECT hans
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DISCONNECT

        static final java.lang.String DISCONNECT
        Disconnect this client.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • READY

        static final java.lang.String READY
        Readies this client. Shouldn't be send when this client is already in this state.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • UNREADY

        static final java.lang.String UNREADY
        Unreadies this client. Shouldn't be send when this client is already in this state
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • CLIENT_MOVE

        static final java.lang.String CLIENT_MOVE
        Used to send move by a client. Example: GAME MOVE 2 1
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ASK_PLAYERS_ALL

        static final java.lang.String ASK_PLAYERS_ALL
        Requests list of players on this server.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ASK_PLAYERS_EXT

        static final java.lang.String ASK_PLAYERS_EXT
        Requests list of players with certain extensions. Example: PLAYERS 012: Request players with extensions 0, 1 AND 2 installed.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • CONFIRM

        static final java.lang.String CONFIRM
        Used to confirm connection. Can also contain server-supported extensions.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • START

        static final java.lang.String START
        Inform client game will start. LAST ARGUMENT CAN BE MULTIPLE NAMES! Example: GAME START bob peter
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SERVER_MOVE

        static final java.lang.String SERVER_MOVE
        Broadcasted message announcing current move and future move (if applicable). Example with future move: GAME MOVE bob 2 0 hans (Current move by bob at (2,0), next is hans). Example without: GAME MOVE hans 2 2 (Current move by hans at (2,2), this was final turn).
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • END_DRAW

        static final java.lang.String END_DRAW
        Broadcasted when game has ended in draw.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • END_WINNER

        static final java.lang.String END_WINNER
        Broadcasted when game has ended in winner. Example: GAME END PLAYER hans: hans has won the game.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • RES_PLAYERS_ALL

        static final java.lang.String RES_PLAYERS_ALL
        Result of player list query. LAST ARGUMENTS CAN BE MULTIPLE NAMES. Example: PLAYERS ALL hans peter dirk tessa: All players in this server are these.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • RES_PLAYERS_EXT

        static final java.lang.String RES_PLAYERS_EXT
        Result of player list query with extension criteria. LAST ARGUMENT CAN BE MULTIPLE NAMES. Example: PLAYERS 0 hans: Of people on the server, only hans supports extension 0.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
